### ContainsProtectableArray() {#acf3eb0f1888bed0ff1df0667cd1036aa}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool ContainsProtectableArray (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42; Ty, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &#42; M, unsigned SSPBufferSize, bool &amp; IsLarge, bool Strong, bool InStruct)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="[out] IsLarge">is set to true if a protectable array is found and it is &quot;large&quot; ( &gt;= ssp-buffer-size). In the case of a structure with multiple arrays, this gets set if any of them is large.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool CreatePrologue (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42; F, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &#42; M, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; CheckLoc, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetloweringbase">TargetLoweringBase</a> &#42; TLI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/allocainst">AllocaInst</a> &#42;&amp; AI)</>}

entry: StackGuardSlot = alloca i8&#42; StackGuard = &lt;stack guard&gt; call void @llvm.stackprotector(StackGuard, StackGuardSlot)

Returns true if the platform/triple supports the stackprotectorcreate pseudo node.

### InsertStackProtectors() {#a2e130f575ee6cbddeb0d62b295dee036}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool InsertStackProtectors (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a> &#42; TM, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42; F, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreeupdater">DomTreeUpdater</a> &#42; DTU, bool &amp; HasPrologue, bool &amp; HasIRCheck)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
InsertStackProtectors - Insert code into the prologue and epilogue of the function.

<ul>
<li>The prologue code loads and stores the stack guard onto the stack.</li>
<li>The epilogue checks the value stored in the prologue against the original value. It calls &#95;&#95;stack&#95;chk&#95;fail if they differ.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line <a href="#l00547">547</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/stackprotector-cpp">StackProtector.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass inserts stack protectors into functions which need them. A variable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with a random value in it is stored onto the stack before the local variables</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are allocated. Upon exiting the block, the stored value is checked. If it&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// changed, then there was some sort of violation and the program aborts.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// it is &quot;large&quot; ( &gt;= ssp-buffer-size).  In the case of a structure with</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209" lineLink="#acf3eb0f1888bed0ff1df0667cd1036aa"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#acf3eb0f1888bed0ff1df0667cd1036aa">ContainsProtectableArray</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &#42;M, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SSPBufferSize,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;IsLarge, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Strong,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InStruct) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Ty)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/arraytype">ArrayType</a> &#42;AT = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;ArrayType&gt;</a>(Ty)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!AT-&gt;getElementType()-&gt;isIntegerTy(8)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we&#39;re on a non-Darwin platform or we&#39;re inside of a structure, don&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// add stack protectors unless the array is a character array.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// However, in strong mode any array, regardless of type and size,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Strong &amp;&amp; (InStruct || !<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/triple">Triple</a>(M-&gt;getTargetTriple()).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/triple/#ab6fdf9b428bc3d57837022121c155cbf">isOSDarwin</a>()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If an array has more than SSPBufferSize bytes of allocated space, then we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// emit stack protectors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SSPBufferSize &lt;= M-&gt;getDataLayout().getTypeAllocSize(AT)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Adjust AllocSize to be the space remaining after this offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can&#39;t subtract a fixed size from a scalable one, so in that case</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// assume the scalable value is of minimum size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a> NewAllocSize =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize/#a003b4369b4130e669dc9139798e0193c">TypeSize::getFixed</a>(AllocSize.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/details/fixedorscalablequantity/#ac4ab9dd9440c55bee1aa4a1195cee759">getKnownMinValue</a>()) - OffsetSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a0ea8063abb874faff99f39c4e849f8de">HasAddressTaken</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, NewAllocSize, M, VisitedPHIs))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::BitCast:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep track of what PHI nodes we have already visited to ensure</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::Load:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::AtomicRMW:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Instruction::Ret:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These instructions take an address operand, but have load-like or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// other innocuous behavior that should not trigger a stack protector.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// atomicrmw conceptually has both load and store semantics, but the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value being stored must be integer; so if a pointer is being stored,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we&#39;ll catch it in the PtrToInt case above.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Conservatively return true for any instruction that takes an address</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &amp;BB : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Check whether or not this function needs a stack protector based</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// upon the stack protector level.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// We use two heuristics: a standard (ssp) and strong (sspstrong).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The standard heuristic which will add a guard variable to functions that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// call alloca with a either a variable size or a size &gt;= SSPBufferSize,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// functions with character buffers larger than SSPBufferSize, and functions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// with aggregates containing character buffers larger than SSPBufferSize. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// strong heuristic will add a guard variables to functions that call alloca</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// regardless of size, functions with any buffer regardless of type and size,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// functions with aggregates that contain any buffer regardless of type and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// size, and functions that contain stack-based variables that have had their</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// address taken.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssplayoutanalysis/#a9263d83965e9f3c52e94ff91bc96eb9c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ssplayoutanalysis/#a9263d83965e9f3c52e94ff91bc96eb9c">SSPLayoutAnalysis::requiresStackProtector</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                               SSPLayoutMap &#42;Layout) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &#42;M = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;getParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Strong = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NeedsProtector = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The set of PHI nodes visited when determining if a variable&#39;s reference has</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// been taken.  This set is maintained to ensure we don&#39;t visit the same PHI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// node multiple times.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;const PHINode &#42;, 16&gt;</a> VisitedPHIs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SSPBufferSize = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;getFnAttributeAsParsedInteger(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;stack-protector-buffer-size&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, SSPLayoutInfo::DefaultSSPBufferSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;hasFnAttribute(Attribute::SafeStack))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We are constructing the OptimizationRemarkEmitter on the fly rather than</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// using the analysis pass to avoid building DominatorTree and LoopInfo which</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;hasFnAttribute(Attribute::StackProtectReq)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Layout)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ORE.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationremarkemitter/#aae6a98aea85aa3af87357cc5448db499">emit</a>(&#91;&amp;&#93;() &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NeedsProtector = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Strong = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use the same heuristic as strong to determine SSPLayout</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &amp;BB : &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/allocainst">AllocaInst</a> &#42;AI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;AllocaInst&gt;</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Create a stack guard loading and populate whether SelectionDAG SSP is</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500" lineLink="#a20ae5f9703535cca3725fdb1512125ab"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="#a20ae5f9703535cca3725fdb1512125ab">getStackGuard</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetloweringbase">TargetLoweringBase</a> &#42;TLI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &#42;M,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use SelectionDAG SSP handling, since there isn&#39;t an IR guard.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is more or less weird, since we optionally output whether we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// should perform a SelectionDAG SP here. The reason is that it&#39;s strictly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// defined as !TLI-&gt;getIRStackGuard(B), where getIRStackGuard is also</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mutating. There is no way to get this bit without mutating the IR, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// getting this bit has to happen in this right time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We could have define a new function TLI::supportsSelectionDAGSP(), but that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will put more burden on the backends&#39; overriding work, especially when it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// actually conveys the same information getIRStackGuard() already gives.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SupportsSelectionDAGSP)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#42;SupportsSelectionDAGSP = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;FailBB = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we&#39;re instrumenting a block with a tail call, the check has to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inserted before the call rather than between it and the return. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// verifier guarantees that a tail call is either directly before the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// return or with a single correct bitcast of the return value in between so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we don&#39;t need to worry about many situations here.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>(CheckLoc);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loadinst">LoadInst</a> &#42;Guard = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateLoad(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.getPtrTy(), AI, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Guard&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Generate the epilogue with inline instrumentation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we do not support SelectionDAG based calls, generate IR level</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// calls.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each block with a return instruction, convert this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   return:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ret ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// into this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   return:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %1 = &lt;stack guard&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %2 = load StackGuardSlot</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %3 = icmp ne i1 %1, %2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     br i1 %3, label %CallStackCheckFailBlk, label %SP&#95;return</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   SP&#95;return:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     ret ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   CallStackCheckFailBlk:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     call void @&#95;&#95;stack&#95;chk&#95;fail()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     unreachable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create the FailBB. We duplicate the BB every time since the MI tail</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// merge pass will merge together all of the various BB into one including</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fail BB generated by the stack protector pseudo instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!FailBB)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">        FailBB = <a href="#a826f32ce82e4b2605718fedddba8a055">CreateFailBB</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, TM-&gt;getTargetTriple());</span></CodeLine>
